name: AVMutableVideoCompositionLayerInstruction
desc: An object used to modify the transform, cropping, and opacity ramps applied to a given track in a mutable composition.

items.name: init(assetTrack: AVAssetTrack)
items.desc: Creates a new mutable video composition layer instruction for the given track.

items.name: var trackID: CMPersistentTrackID
items.desc: The track identifier of the source track to which the compositor applies the instruction.

items.name: func setOpacity(Float, at: CMTime)
items.desc: Sets the opacity value at a specific time within the time range of the instruction.

items.name: func setOpacityRamp(fromStartOpacity: Float, toEndOpacity: Float, timeRange: CMTimeRange)
items.desc: Sets an opacity ramp to apply during a specified time range.

items.name: func setTransform(CGAffineTransform, at: CMTime)
items.desc: Sets the transform value at a time within the time range of the instruction.

items.name: func setTransformRamp(fromStart: CGAffineTransform, toEnd: CGAffineTransform, timeRange: CMTimeRange)
items.desc: Sets a transform ramp to apply during a given time range.

items.name: func setCropRectangle(CGRect, at: CMTime)
items.desc: Sets the crop rectangle value at a time within the time range of the instruction.

items.name: func setCropRectangleRamp(fromStartCropRectangle: CGRect, toEndCropRectangle: CGRect, timeRange: CMTimeRange)
items.desc: Sets a crop rectangle ramp to apply during the specified time range.
